// http://www.codechef.com/problems/KC03
// climate

#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <algorithm>
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

#define pb(x) push_back(x)

int main()
{
	 int t;
	 scanf("%d",&t);
	 while(t--)
	 {
				  int n;
				  scanf("%d",&n);
				  int x[n][n];
				  for(int i = 0; i < n; ++i)for(int j = 0; j < n; ++j)scanf("%d",&x[i][j]);
				  int c1 = 0, c2 = 0;
				  int ind1, ind2;
				  //row cnt
				  for(int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
				  {
							 int temp = 0;
							 for(int j = 0; j < n; j++)
							         temp = temp ^ x[i][j];
							 if(temp){c1++; ind1 = i + 1;}
  			 	  }
  			 	  // colomn count
  			 	  for(int j = 0; j < n; ++j)
  			 	  {
							 int temp = 0;
							 for(int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
							         temp = temp ^ x[i][j];
							 if(temp){c2++; ind2 = j + 1;}
  			 	  }
  			 	  //cout << c1 << " " << c2 << endl;
  			 	  if(c1 == 0 && c2 == 0)printf("1\n");
  			 	  else if(c1 == 1 && c2 == 1)printf("(%d,%d)\n",ind1, ind2);
  			 	  else printf("0\n");
  	 }
	 return 0;
}
